messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who introduced the author Paul Fricker to roleplaying games and the works of H.P. Lovecraft?
Phillip Sidebotham
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the title of the Lovecraftian story that the author read from one of his father's books?
Pickman's Model
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who are the recipients of the first two thank-you messages?
Mike Mason and Phillip Sidebotham
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What are the two recipients of the third thank-you message?
The fans and backers of Call of Cthulhu and Chaosium
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What did Phillip Sidebotham introduce Paul Fricker to?
Roleplaying games and the works of H.P. Lovecraft
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the title of the publication being referenced in the thank-you messages?
Call of Cthulhu
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the name of the company being referenced in the thank-you messages?
Chaosium
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who wrote the 7th edition rules with development and additional material?
Paul Fricker

Who assisted with Cristoforo font typesetting?
Tony Williams

Who updated the timelines?
John French and Mike Mason

Joe Schillizzi

Matthew Sanderson

Dean Engelhardt

What edition does this current edition draw from earlier editions of Call of Cthulhu rules?
The Call of Cthulhu rules

Who are some of the authors whose work has been used or revised in this current edition?

Sandy Petersen, Lynn Willis, Keith Herber, Kevin Ross, Mark Morrison, William Hamblin, Scott David Aniolowski, Michael Tice, Shannon Appel, Eric Rowe, Bruce Ballon, William G. Dunn, Sam Johnson, Brian M. Sammons, Jan Eng
